command.help:
§e/signvote <create|delete|addscore|open|close|vote|deletevp>
Run subcommands without arguments to see their help.

create.help: /signvote create <session name> - create a new session with the given name

delete.help: /signvote deletesess <session name> - delete the specified vote session.

deletevp.help: /signvote deletevp <session name> <votepoint name> - delete the specified votepoint

addscore.help: /signvote addscore <session name> <score> <limit> [permission] - create a vote score limit for the given session and permission if provided

open.help: /signvote open <session name> - re-open a closed session

close.help: /signvote close <session name> - close an opened session

vote.help: /signvote vote <session name> <votepoint name> <score> - vote to a given votepoint with a provided score

error.reachedlimit: §cYou can't vote anymore with that score!
error.alreadyvoted: §cYou have already voted to this votepoint.

error.onlyforplayers: §cThis command can only be run by players.
error.vpexists: §cA votepoint with that name already exists!

votepoint.created: §aVotepoint created with a name of §6{1} §afor the session §6{0}.
votepoint.break:
§eYou are about to break a votepoint.
Type §6/signvote deletevp {0} {1} §eto delete the votepoint.
